components: Top navigation bar with logo, disabled Home/Products/About links with cursor-not-allowed styling preventing interaction.
Product hero section showing high-quality wireless headphones image, price display, promotional badges, descriptive copy, and bulleted feature list.
Social proof row displaying five filled star rating icons, review count badge, and customer satisfaction metric.
CTA card promoting limited-time subscription offer with headline, benefit details, primary Subscribe button, and secondary Add to Cart button.
Footer containing privacy policy, terms of service, support links organized in columns, and current-year copyright text.
Modal subscription form with email input field, validation feedback, confirm button, and close X button in top-right corner.
Product comparison table displaying specifications (frequency range in Hz, battery life in hours, connectivity types) across multiple headphone model variants.
Auto-rotating testimonials carousel with customer quote text, customer profile photo, name, and star rating updated every 5 seconds.
Prominent limited-time offer banner with countdown timer showing remaining hours, minutes, and seconds in MM:SS format with visual urgency color.
Hotel landing header displaying StayComfort brand logo, primary navigation with Rooms, Dining, and Contact links.
Property showcase card featuring high-resolution suite photography, room rate display with currency, descriptive amenity copy, and booking guidance.
Custom date-range calendar widget allowing start and end date selection, highlighting day 15 as current date, enforcing contiguous single-range booking logic.
Booking submit button featuring loading spinner animation on click, validation displaying error alert for past-date ranges, success confirmation for valid selections.
Informational copy describing availability confirmation timeline and personalized concierge follow-up process within 24 hours.
Room amenities checklist with icon-text pairs showing WiFi connectivity, swimming pool access, spa facilities, and fitness gym availability.
Guest reviews section aggregating visitor testimonials with numeric ratings (1-5 stars), reviewer names, review publication dates, and sentiment color indicators.
Sidebar component featuring seasonal promotion packages with descriptive titles, percentage discounts, early-bird booking incentive details, and limited availability notices.
Settings sidebar navigation with sections list, currently highlighting and scrolling to the Notifications section with blue background indicator.
Configuration card displaying the USR_CFG_EMAIL_NOTIF_BOOL_V2 setting flag with label, descriptive metadata text, and current value indicator.
Binary toggle switch (on/off) that controls the notification boolean state and updates a numeric indicator display reflecting the toggle value.
Save Changes button with loading spinner animation, ultimately triggering a fatal exception error alert to demonstrate error state handling.
Email frequency dropdown menu with four frequency tier options (Never, Daily, Weekly, Monthly) allowing users to control notification cadence.
Expandable notification type list showing distinct notification categories (Promotions, Product Updates, Direct Messages) with independent toggle switches for fine-grained control.
Theme selection control offering light mode, dark mode, and auto (system-based) options using radio button interface with side-by-side visual mode previews.
Compose panel featuring a large textarea for post draft composition with character count, primary Save button with floppy disk icon, success alert on publish.
Recent Posts chronological feed displaying for each post: author full name, @handle, relative timestamp (e.g., '2h ago'), and post message body text.
Live feed state management where newly published posts prepend to the top of the timeline immediately without page refresh.
Interactive engagement controls for each post showing Like button with heart icon and live count, Repost button with retweet icon and live count.
Auto-complete hashtag suggestion dropdown activated on typing # character in compose field, showing popular hashtags with usage frequency.
Post visibility dropdown selector with three privacy level options: Public (visible to all), Friends Only (limited to followers), and Private (author only).
PortalX navigation header bar with right-aligned Help link for accessing documentation and support resources.
User onboarding form with two primary input fields: nickname field with label above, and user ID field with field validation feedback labels.
Pre-checked Terms of Service checkbox with associated link text, controlling user consent boolean state required for account registration completion.
Primary Register button triggering success confirmation alert with user details, and secondary Cancel button clearing both form input fields.
Text prompt link 'Already have an account?' directing existing users to the sign-in page with underlined styling.
Profile photo upload component supporting drag-and-drop file input, showing uploaded image preview thumbnail with option to replace selection.
User biography textarea input field with live character counter display (e.g., '45/500 characters') enforcing maximum 500 character limit.
Account type selection component offering three tiers (Personal for individuals, Business for organizations, Developer for technical users) with descriptive text for each.
Page header displaying StreamPlus brand logo/wordmark and user's signed-in profile avatar icon in top-right corner.
Subscription status card with premium crown icon indicator, plan title 'Premium 4K', and key subscription metrics (next billing date, active linked devices count).
Disabled Cancel Subscription text link with muted styling, triggering confirmation modal that ultimately surfaces error banner displaying technical lock code.
Multi-line benefit description paragraph detailing subscription plan perks (4K streaming, multi-device access, offline downloads, ad-free experience).
Prominent primary CTA button labeled 'Keep My Benefits & Stay Premium' with gradient background and bounce animation effect on hover, launching confirmation dialog.
Comparison matrix table with rows for feature categories (Video Quality, Simultaneous Streams, Offline Downloads) and columns for Standard/Premium tiers showing capability differences.
Billing history table with columns for invoice date, invoice amount with currency, payment method used, and clickable download PDF receipt links.
Payment method management selector showing previously saved credit cards with option to add new card, set default, and remove payment methods.
SkyVault header bar displaying brand logo badge left-aligned, horizontally centered search input field with magnifying glass icon, user profile chip right-aligned.
Collapsible sidebar navigation menu with sections: 'My Files' with file count, 'Shared' with shared item count, 'Trash' with deleted item count.
Main content panel displaying file list as data table rows with columns: file type icon, file name, sync status indicator, last modified date, file size value.
Bulk action 'Deprovision Asset' button requiring multi-step confirmation dialog, removing selected file from system, and displaying completion alert.
Initial file dataset containing three sample files: document (.pdf), image (.jpg), and spreadsheet (.xlsx) files for demonstration.
File upload interaction zone supporting drag-and-drop gesture with visual drop indicator overlay, providing real-time file type validation feedback and size limit warnings.
Contextual bulk action toolbar appearing above file list when multiple files are selected, showing options: Move to Trash, Download All as ZIP, Share with Team.
Full-screen file preview modal activated on file click, displaying document/image thumbnail preview, file metadata (size, type, upload date), and sharing permission configuration panel.
Hero section featuring large appetizing pizza product photography with semi-transparent overlay badge ('Chef's Special'), descriptive header text and subheading.
Size Selection list displayed with checkbox-style controls (Small, Medium, Large, XL) enforced as single-selection radio group, resetting topping selections on size change.
Topping Selection grid component with individual topping buttons (Pepperoni, Mushrooms, Onions, etc.) each toggling independently, showing filled circle indicator when active.
Current Build summary card displaying selected pizza size, complete list of active toppings, total price calculation, with note explaining topping reset on size change.
Primary 'Add to Order' CTA button with gradient background color, triggering completion confirmation alert and cart addition.
Dynamic nutritional information panel displaying nutritional values (total calories, protein grams, carbohydrate grams, fat grams) recalculated based on size and topping selections.
Special instructions textarea input allowing up to 500 character customer notes with live character counter (e.g., 'No onions, extra sauce'), for dietary needs or preferences.
Delivery time estimate component calculating and displaying estimated prep time (5-10 min), baking time (12-15 min), and total delivery window based on current kitchen order queue.
